featureDropdown.title: Semantic Frame Parsing
featureDropdown.description: Automatically extract structured semantic frames from unstructured text, preserving meaning and relationships.

featureDropdown.title: Recursive Memory
featureDropdown.description: Build knowledge graphs that learn from every interaction, creating self-improving memory systems.

featureDropdown.title: Context-Aware Operations
featureDropdown.description: Smart operation suggestions that adapt to content type and context, with self-instructing capabilities.

featureDropdown.title: Multi-Source Ingestion
featureDropdown.description: Ingest from any source—Slack, email, docs, audio—and transform into structured, queryable knowledge.
